Module com.example.sesion5
Package com.example.sesion5.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.example.sesion5.model.WordAdapter
com.example.sesion5.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
IWord
public class Game extends WordAdapter
The Game class extends WordAdapter and manages the gameplay for a word guessing game. It handles the secret word, player attempts, and hints.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class

    Game.Hint
    The Hint class provides functionality for using hints in the game.

  • Method Details

    • isInputCorrect

      public boolean isInputCorrect(String letterInput)
      Checks if the provided letter input is correct. A valid input must not be a digit or whitespace and must be a letter.
      Specified by:
      isInputCorrect in interface IWord
      Overrides:
      isInputCorrect in class WordAdapter
      Parameters:
      letterInput - the letter input to validate
      Returns:
      true if the input is correct, false otherwise

    • isInputFull

      public boolean isInputFull(String wordInput)
      Checks if the provided word input is full. In this implementation, a full input must have exactly 1 character.
      Specified by:
      isInputFull in interface IWord
      Overrides:
      isInputFull in class WordAdapter
      Parameters:
      wordInput - the word input to check
      Returns:
      true if the input is full, false otherwise

    • checkGameProgress

      public int checkGameProgress()
      Checks the progress of the game. Returns -1 if the game is over, 1 if the player has won, or 0 if the game can continue.
      Returns:
      the game progress status
